SUBSCRIBE_MODAL.TITLE: Subscribe to our Newsletter!
SUBSCRIBE_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Be the first one to get the latest earthquake updates.

UNSUBSCRIBE_PAGE.TITLE: Dear {{firstName}},
UNSUBSCRIBE_PAGE.ALREADY_UNSUBSCRIBED: Seems like you are not subscribed to our mailing list.
UNSUBSCRIBE_PAGE.SUCCESS_MESSAGE:
We are sorry to see you go, but we respect your decision.
You have been successfully unsubscribed from our mailing list.
